page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: MOST OF THE EDUCATION IN OUR AREA TAKES PLACE IN OUR SCHOOL BECAUSE THERE ARE NO OTHER SCHOOLS IN OUR AREA. OUR SCHOOL IS A SMALL VILLAGE SCHOOL AND THE BUILDING IS ABOUT 75 YEARS OLD. THE SCHOOL BUILDING USED TO BE THE LORD WANDSWORTH PRIVATE SCHOOL FOR POOR CHILDREN BUT NOW THAT IS MUCH BIGGER AND FURTHER UP THE ROAD, AND THE LORD WANDSWORTH TRUST SOLD THE SCHOOL TO THE HAMPSHIRE COUNTY COUNCIL.THERE WAS ANOTHER SCHOOL IN OUR AREA AT SOUTH WARNBOROUGH,BUT THAT CLOSED AND THE CHILDREN CAME TO OUR SCHOOL. THE NUMBER OF CHILDREN IN OUR SCHOOL IS BECOMING LESS AND LESS BECAUSE THERE IS NOT MUCH NEW BUILDING AND MANY OF THE PEOPLE NOW LIVING IN THE AREA GO TO PRIVATE SCHOOLS.IN OUR SCHOOL WE DO ALL THE NORMAL SORTS OF LESSONS AND GAMES.WE HAVE A HEADMASTER AND THREE LADY TEACHERS.
